thread.title: The state-level economic development zone has shown a good development trend - Teller Report
thread.title_full: The state-level economic development zone has shown a good development trend - Teller Report

author: Anonym
title: The state-level economic development zone has shown a good development trend - Teller Report
text: Recently, the Ministry of Commerce completed the assessment and evaluation of the comprehensive development level of the 2023 National Economic and Technological Development Zones (hereinafter referred to as the "National Economic and Technological Development Zone"), and assessed and evaluated the comprehensive development level of 230 national economic and technological development zones across the country in 2022. According to the latest assessment and evaluation results, Suzhou Industrial Park, Guangzhou Economic and Technological Development Zone, Tianjin Economic and Technological Development Zone, and Wuhu Economic and Technological Development Zone have entered the top 30 in the comprehensive ranking of national economic and technological development zones. At the same time, Kunshan Economic and Technological Development Zone and Ningbo Economic and Technological Development Zone ranked high in terms of total import and export volume; Guangzhou's Nansha Economic and Technological Development Zone and Dalian Economic and Technological Development Zone have performed well in terms of actual use of foreign investment. On the whole, as a high-level platform for opening up to the outside world, the national economic development zone has actively promoted high-quality economic development, played an important role in consolidating the basic market of foreign trade and foreign investment, and showed a good development trend of expanding the total amount, improving the quality, and further enhancing the driving role of opening up. The quality of economic development has been improved. In 2022, the national economic development zone will achieve a GDP of 14 trillion yuan, accounting for 12% of GDP. As of the end of 2022, there were 30,15 manufacturing enterprises with a main business income of more than 1765 billion yuan in the national economic development zones in the eastern region and more than . billion yuan in the national economic development zones in the central and western regions, a significant increase from the previous year. The role of openness has been enhanced. In 2022, the actual use of foreign investment in state-level economic development zones was US$432.23 billion, accounting for 10% of the country's actual use of foreign investment. The total import and export volume was 3.25 trillion yuan, accounting for 3% of the country's total import and export volume; Among them, the import and export volume of high-tech products is 27 trillion yuan, accounting for % of the national import and export volume of high-tech products. Improvement of scientific and technological innovation capabilities. As of the end of 2022, the national economic development zone has 683 national incubators and maker spaces, 1,2 R&D institutions at the provincial level and above, and 6,5 high-tech enterprises, all of which have increased significantly from the end of the previous year. The level of green and low-carbon has been improved. In 2022, the energy consumption and water consumption per unit of industrial added value of industrial enterprises above designated size in the national economic development zone decreased significantly year-on-year, and the comprehensive utilization rate of industrial solid waste increased by 2 percentage points compared with the previous year. Coordinated regional development and upgrading. By the end of 2022, the number of border (cross-border) cooperation zones between the state-level economic development zones in the eastern region and the state-level economic development zones in the central and western regions, and the number of border (cross-border) cooperation zones in the state-level economic development zones providing assistance to Xinjiang and Tibet has increased by 126 compared with the previous year. The year 2024 marks the 40th anniversary of the establishment of the first batch of state-level economic development zones. He Yadong, spokesman of the Ministry of Commerce, said that the state-level economic development zone is an important carrier of China's opening up to the outside world, and has always played a pioneering and leading role. The main indicators of the state-level economic development zones have maintained growth, the growth rate is higher than the national average, and the proportion of the whole country has further increased, making an important contribution to consolidating the basic market of foreign trade and foreign investment. "We will promote the national economic development zone to a new level." He Yadong said that on the basis of publicizing and summarizing the construction experience and development achievements of the past 40 years, the Ministry of Commerce will strengthen macro guidance and promote high-level opening up and high-quality development. Support the state-level economic development zones in the eastern region to play the role of the "main force" in consolidating the basic market of foreign trade and foreign investment, enhance the ability of the state-level economic development zones in the central and western regions to undertake industrial transfer, and promote the innovation and upgrading of the national-level economic development zones in the northeast region. At the same time, establish a long-term mechanism, improve the full-cycle management of upgrading, assessment and exit, and comprehensively improve the quality and level of development. Wang Junling (Source: People's Daily Overseas Edition)
